Yep, I just read some background info about the characters, and my suspicions have been confirmed. That Fujino guy at the end will become a center piece of the story. "He will first appear in volume 2, but in the future he'll be a key man in the series, becoming heavily involved with the four main characters." So basically he's the "bull" of the story. Get ready for some despicable shit.

New volume coming soon, huh? Well, it's easy to tell what the ending will be. The black-haired girl clearly has no feelings for the MC, and the guy is clearly just cuck fodder for the plot. Hell, he even wore a shirt with "cuckold" on it. They'll never have a relationship. She'll just keep fucking every guy that comes her way. If they do end up dating, it'll be a full-on cuckold relationship where the protagonist WANTS his girl to get fucked by other guys. Ask yourself, has he EVER disliked seeing the bald guy fucking the black-haired girl? Nope. He only got harder and sometimes joined them. I hope none of you guys are expecting a good ending out of this. It'll be twisted and disgusting to the bitter end, so don't get attached.
Fuck NNN you could do whatever you want. If you don't want to, you don't have to.

This guy deserves everything he's feeling. He was never clear about his feelings to his friend or the girl. Every time his friend started to make a move on his girl, instead of saying something, he let himself get pulled in by the other girl and since it felt good, he just went with it. Clearly, she's very into this open deal they have going on, hanging your heart up on her is only going to lead to more pain. He could have stopped this situation a long time ago but just went along with it, because he enjoyed it too. I really can't feel too bad for him.

Lol, I just realized this niggas shirt during the festival said "cuckold". 10 months, and I never caught that shit lol. But this story is so annoying. The blonde hair clearly sees that MC likes the black haired one. This can be resolved so easily with a "Bro, chill, lemme talk to you for a sec." Cause his "friend" has been WILDIN for the whole chapter. As a timid guy myself, I understand the MC. But jeez man, if you're not gonna confess, at least tell your "friend", if you can even call him that, cause MC just lets this guy walk all over their friendship and he doesn't even know he's doing it.  Chill tf out, and make sex arrangements as friends since you know he has cram school. Then he works up the courage to save y'all from being raped, and you can't even so much as shoot the man a text and say "Thanks"? Ugh, this is one of the only NTR stories that bothers me. Cause rape scene aside, this shit actually be happening on the daily. Niggas too timid to make the first move.

@Mee_nurr_vahh Ahh. Those are the only NTR stories that hit different for me, because they're not your usual mindbreak, over the top nonsense. And Key, at this point, is just trolling us. Scab is similar to Ultramarine. Key knows we want a sequel to ultramarine, or even a whole series, but is constantly trolling us. There was a small scene of the sequel in Turn, which I loved but hated at the same time for doing that to me.
